lines.text: I had to... he broke me... and even though he always fixed me... I had to make sure that this time he wouldn't hurt me again.

I tried to be a good boy father... but I never could be a real son... a real son... like Derek. His real son died before he was born... that's why he made me. When he found out I rigged those toys and sent them to his house... he was so angry. But don't you see Derek has to die... then you can be my mommy.
I can love you like a real son
I can... I can... I CAN... I CAN. I love you mommy... I love you... I want you... I need you
You can be my son... you can come home with me

[shouts]
NO! Derek has to die... it's the only way.
Father... father... help me... all he wanted was a son... he made me... father... don't leave me.
Hhhe... wan... wanted... a... a... real... bbbboy... I... was... nnnot... gggood... eeenough... ffforr... hhhim.
Damnit where's my boy? I want my boy!
I'M YOU'RE SON NOW... NOT HIM! NOT HIM! NOT HIM!
[Starts slashing the suspended bags with a knife]
Don't hurt Derek! You can be my son... you can come home with me

[shouts]
NO! Derek has to die... it's the only way.
Ffffather... father... help... hhhelp me... all he wanted was a son... he made me... father... don't leave me.
